Class Door

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Door
extends java.awt.Rectangle
    small opening for player to travel between rooms
    Author:
    Emily

    • Constructor Detail

      • Door

        public Door(int direction,
            Room adj,
            java.awt.Rectangle bounds,
            java.lang.String tag)
        Parameters:
        direction - which face of a room the door is on (N, S, E, W)
        adj - adjacent room that door connects to
        bounds - rectangle boundaries of door
        tag - text that appears once player gets near door

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        draws a black rectangle that represents door
        Parameters:
        drawer - interface that draws door

      • exitTo

        public Room exitTo()
        Returns:
        return access to the adjacent room this door leads to

      • hasEntered

        public boolean hasEntered(Sprite player)
        detects if player is within boundaries of door
        Parameters:
        player - player that enters door
        Returns:
        true if player intersects with door bounds; false otherwise

      • getDirection

        public int getDirection()
        Returns:
        which face of the room door is on (N,S,E,W)

      • invisible

        public void invisible()
        stops door from displaying on window
